## Introduction

This vignette demonstrates how to connect to the V&A MCP server and perform a basic search.

## Connecting

First, establish a connection to the server.

```{r connect}
client <- mcp_connect()
print(client)
```

## Searching

Now, let's search for items related to "Morris".

```{r search}
results <- mcp_search(client, "Morris")
head(results)
```

The results include the object ID, title, date, artist, and other metadata.

```{r session-info}
sessionInfo()
```
